title: Complete Dependence on Oil for Electricity
description: In 2021, Comoros produced 100% of its electricity from oil sources, indicating a complete reliance on fossil fuels for energy production.

title: Negligible Industrial F-gases Emissions
description: As of 2023, Comoros recorded minimal F-gases emissions from industrial processes, with a value of just 0.0001 Mt CO2e, showcasing its low industrial pollution footprint.

title: Low Efficiency in Revenue Mobilization
description: In 2023, Comoros had a CPIA efficiency of revenue mobilization rating of 2, indicating challenges in effectively collecting and managing public revenues.

title: Unfavorable Trade Terms
description: The net barter terms of trade index for Comoros stood at 59.8 in 2021, reflecting less favorable trade conditions compared to the base year of 2015.
